competency_mapping.description: Comprehensive assessment of all required skill areas based on the entire interview transcript

skill_area.description: Name of the skill area being evaluated

overall_assessment.description: Overall proficiency level for this skill area based on holistic analysis

meets_requirements.description: Whether the candidate meets the job requirements for this skill area

confidence.description: Confidence level in this assessment based on available evidence

assessment_notes.description: 3-5 key bullet points summarizing performance, strengths, evidence, and gaps in this skill area

sub_skills.description: Individual assessment of each sub-skill within this skill area

proficiency.description: Demonstrated proficiency level based on transcript evidence

demonstrated.description: Whether this sub-skill was clearly demonstrated or inferred from the interview

evidence.description: Specific evidence points or examples from across the entire transcript that support this assessment

gaps_identified.description: Specific knowledge gaps or areas for improvement identified

overall_skills_summary.description: High-level summary of the candidate's skills competency

total_skill_areas_assessed.description: Total number of skill areas evaluated

skill_areas_meeting_requirements.description: Number of skill areas where candidate meets requirements

strongest_skill_areas.description: Top 3 skill areas where candidate demonstrated strongest competency

development_areas.description: Top 3 skill areas that would benefit from development

overall_competency_level.description: Overall competency level across all assessed skills

hiring_recommendation_skills.description: Hiring recommendation based purely on skills competency assessment

key_findings.description: 3-5 key findings from the comprehensive skills assessment
